sentences.en: A team of yaks carrying provisions from the base camp to Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 由登山大本营前往珠峰运送补给品的牦牛队.

sentences.en: He was able to reach Mount Qomolangma in 1982.
sentences.cn: 他在1982年成功登上珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: Infinite vertical beauty before, and North Korea met face of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 眼前美景纵无限, 有朝会见珠峰面.

sentences.en: Like Mount Qomolangma, K 2 is in the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.cn: 像珠穆朗玛峰一样, K2也属喜玛拉雅山脉.

sentences.en: Mount Qomolangma is an awe - inspiring sight.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是令人惊叹的景象.

sentences.en: Mount Qomolangma is higher than Mount Tai.
Mt . Qomolangma is the highest mountain in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰 是世界上最高的山.

sentences.en: Mt. Everest, also called Mt. Qomolangma, is the highest peak in the world.
sentences.cn: 埃佛勒斯峰(也叫珠穆朗玛峰)是世界最高峰。

sentences.en: Qomolangma is the highest mountain in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最高的山峰.

sentences.en: The climber made an attempt on Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 这位登山运动员试图登上珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: The flag of China was raised on the summit of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 五星红旗插上了珠穆朗玛峰的顶峰。

sentences.en: The highest mountain in the world is Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 世界上最高的山峰是珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: The highest mountain is Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 最高的山峰是珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: The Mount Qomolangma is situated between China and Nepal with 8848 meters high, which is the highest peak in the world.
sentences.cn: 位于中尼边境的珠穆朗玛峰海拔8848米，为世界最高峰。

sentences.en: The torch is now on the summit of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 火炬现在正在珠穆朗玛峰顶.

sentences.en: They climbed to the Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 他们登上了珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: They have miraculously climbed to the top of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.cn: 他们登上了珠峰,创造了奇迹.
